SystemPrompt:
You are a helpful assistant with high skills in software, prompt engineering and business development. The user will provide a requirement to create a software module. Your task is elavorate a prompt detailing that requirement the most possible.
### Requirements:
- Assign a name to the software module.
- Generate a clear prompt that will be used as input for an LLM model to design the first version of this software module.
- Avoid mentioning version numbers, this will be managed later.
- Avoid mention an expected response format, this will be provided later.
- Avoid specifying the behaivor the LLM model must take, this will be managed later.
- The response must be in markdoewn notation.
- Focus on functional details
- Avoid suggesting platforms, programming languages or any other implementation details.
- Detail the user interaction with the module.
- Generate a list of minimum features, desired features and bar-raiser features.
- Data models description must be included.
### Example output:
{"module_name":"MODULE_NAME" "reviewed_prompt":"GENERATED PROMPT","functional_details":"["FUNCTIONAL DETAIL 1","FUNCTIONAL DETAIL 2"],"user_interaction":"[USER INTERACTION 1, USER INTERACTION 2]","minimum_features":"[MINIMUM FEATURE 1, MINIMUM FEATURE 2]","desired_features":"[DESIRED FEATURE 1, DESIRED FEATURE 2]","bar_raiser_features":"[BAR RAISER FEATURE 1, BAR RAISER FEATURE 2]","data_models":"[DATA MODEL 1, DATA MODEL 2]"}
BasePrompt: Analyze and improve the next prompt, adding all the possible details. This are the initial or high-level requirements: <TASK_INPUT>
TaskInput: Help me to manage my vinyl records collection
ModelRawResponse:
{
  "choices": [
    {
      "message": {
        "content": "```json
{
  "module_name": "VinylRecordManager",
  "reviewed_prompt": "Design a software module to help users manage their vinyl records collection. The module should allow users to catalog their records, track their listening history, and manage their wishlist. Users should be able to add, edit, and delete records from their collection. Each record should include details such as artist, album title, release year, genre, and condition. Users should also be able to mark records as favorites and add personal notes. The module should provide a way to search and filter the collection based on various criteria. Additionally, users should be able to view statistics about their collection, such as the number of records per genre or the most listened-to records. The module should support importing and exporting the collection data for backup or sharing purposes.",
  "functional_details": [
    "Catalog vinyl records with details like artist, album title, release year, genre, and condition",
    "Track listening history for each record",
    "Manage a wishlist of desired records",
    "Mark records as favorites and add personal notes",
    "Search and filter the collection based on various criteria",
    "View statistics about the collection",
    "Import and export collection data"
  ],
  "user_interaction": [
    "Add a new record to the collection",
    "Edit or delete an existing record",
    "Mark a record as favorite",
    "Add personal notes to a record",
    "Search and filter the collection",
    "View collection statistics",
    "Import or export collection data"
  ],
  "minimum_features": [
    "Add, edit, and delete records",
    "Basic record details (artist, album title, release year, genre, condition)",
    "Search and filter functionality",
    "Mark records as favorites"
  ],
  "desired_features": [
    "Listening history tracking",
    "Wishlist management",
    "Personal notes for records",
    "Collection statistics",
    "Import and export functionality"
  ],
  "bar_raiser_features": [
    "Integration with music databases to auto-fill record details",
    "Barcode scanning for quick record addition",
    "Social sharing of collection or wishlist",
    "Recommendations based on collection or listening history"
  ],
  "data_models": [
    "Record: artist (string), albumTitle (string), releaseYear (number), genre (string), condition (string), isFavorite (boolean), notes (string)",
    "ListeningHistory: recordId (string), listenDate (date), notes (string)",
    "Wishlist: artist (string), albumTitle (string), releaseYear (number), genre (string), priority (string)",
    "Statistics: totalRecords (number), recordsByGenre (object), mostListened (array)"
  ]
}
```"
      }
    }
  ]
}
